title: The Shawshank Redemption
artists: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Matrix
artists: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Batman
artists: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

title: Troy
artists: Julian Glover, Brian Cox, Nathan Jones, Adoni Maropis
description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

title: Men of Honor
artists: Robert De Niro, Cuba Gooding Jr., Charlize Theron, Aunjanue Ellis
description: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.

title: Good Will Hunting
artists: Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsg√•rd, John Mighton
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: The Departed
artists: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Million Dollar Baby
artists: Clint Eastwood, Hilary Swank, Morgan Freeman, Jay Baruchel
description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

title: 12 Angry Men
artists: Martin Balsam, John Fiedler, Lee J. Cobb, E.G. Marshall
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Schindler's List
artists: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes, Caroline Goodall
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Goodfellas
artists: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: Inception
artists: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Tom Hardy
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
artists: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Life Is Beautiful
artists: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: The Green Mile
artists: Tom Hanks, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt, Michael Clarke Duncan
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: Interstellar
artists: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Gladiator
artists: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Intouchables
artists: Fran√ßois Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Two Hearts as One
artists: Serkan Senalp, Hande Soral, Fikret Hakan, Yagmur Kasifoglu
description: A look inside the story of two newlyweds who are parted from each other and spend the next half-century of their lives trying to reunite.

title: My Father and My Son
artists: Eser Sariyar, √áetin Tekindor, Fikret Kuskan, H√ºmeyra
description: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.
